title: ICG Notification 2025 - Apply Offline for 14 Engine Driver, Lascar and Other Posts
description: The Indian Coast Guard (ICG) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 14Â Store Keepers, Civilian Motor Transport Drivers, Lascars, Peons, and welders. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 10th pass, 12th, and ITI can apply for the ICG Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode.
